rows.label: tlk41100121_05_msg0001
rows.name:
So Acedia is gone, huh? All
the people who came from there
are all at a total loss...

rows.label: tlk41100121_05_msg0002
rows.name:
It's not just that
their home is gone...

rows.label: tlk41100121_05_msg0003
rows.name:
They say having their faith
betrayed is even harder.

rows.label: tlk41100121_05_msg0004
rows.name:
That's why I'm swimming
with the kids who evacuated
here, to cheer them up!

rows.label: tlk41100121_05_msg0005
rows.name:
'Cause I learned that if we become
friends and swim together, we won't
have to feel anxious anymore!
